/* TableLayoutMapper.mergeTableByStore */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_TABLE A USING (SELECT #{storeCd} STORE_CD, LPAD(#{tblCd}, 2, '0') TBL_CD FROM DUAL ) ORG ON (A.STORE_CD = ORG.STORE_CD AND A.TBL_CD = ORG.TBL_CD )
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.TBL_NM = #{tblNm}, A.TBL_GRP_CD = LPAD(#{tblGrpCd}, 2, '0'), A.TBL_SEAT_CNT = #{tblSeatCnt}, A.X = #{x}, A.Y = #{y}, A.WIDTH = #{width}, A.HEIGHT = #{height}, A.TBL_TYPE_FG = #{tblTypeFg}, A.IMG_NM = #{imgNm}, A.USE_YN = #{useYn}, A.MOD_DT = #{regDt}, A.MOD_ID = #{regId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.TBL_CD, A.TBL_NM, A.TBL_GRP_CD, A.TBL_SEAT_CNT, A.X, A.Y, A.WIDTH, A.HEIGHT, A.TBL_TYPE_FG, A.IMG_NM, A.USE_YN, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, LPAD(#{tblCd}, 2, '0'), #{tblNm}, LPAD(#{tblGrpCd}, 2, '0'), #{tblSeatCnt}, #{x}, #{y}, #{width}, #{height}, #{tblTypeFg}, #{imgNm}, #{useYn}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{regDt}, #{regId} )
